title: Update User Content Preferences
description: A user wants to update their content preferences to get better recommendations.

tasks.description: Guide the user to the content preference settings in their account.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides clear instructions for the user to find the settings.

tasks.description: Allow the user to select their favorite genres and rate several movies and shows.
tasks.expected_outcome: The user updates their preferences in the UI.

tasks.description: Trigger a refresh of the user's recommendation profile based on their new preferences.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent initiates a profile refresh, and the user's homepage is updated with new recommendations.
